title: Ebonwood armor
summaries: Ebonwood armor is an armor set consisting of a Ebonwood Helmet, Ebonwood Breastplate, and Ebonwood Greaves.

It is crafted solely from <linked>Ebonwood</linked> harvested from <linked>Corrupt Trees</linked>. It acts as the Corruption counterpart to the <linked>Crimson's</linked> <linked>Shadewood armor</linked>, which shares same stats. Along with its counterpart, it is the most powerful <linked>Surface</linked> <linked>Pre-Hardmode</linked> wooden set, though it still pales in comparison to most other armor sets.
Wearing a full set grants a set bonus of 1 additional defense, providing a total of 5 defense.
